headline.main: MANNING ATTACKS ANTI-ALLIED BLOCS; Charges All Who Spread Race Prejudice or Propaganda Are Disloyal to U.S.

lead_paragraph: At this time, when America stands committed to the defeat of Hitlerism, those groups and persons who seek to arouse race prejudice or to spread propaganda against nations fighting Hitler are disloyal to the government and are giving direct aid to Hitler, Bishop William T. Manning asserted yesterday at the Cathedral of St. John the Divine in a special sermon on the world crisis.
